title: Buying Kiernan & Ray Ryan Portraits! List inside!
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: Buying Kiernan & Ray Ryan Portraits! List inside!
posts.post_content:
Would love to pick up some lower end copies, ungraded preferred. Trying to collect T206's of players with cool faces (C. Smith and Titus acquired). Send a PM or shoot me an email at:
[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you!

List of current needs:
Kiernan, O.M. back 
Ryan, O.M. or Piedmont
Magee, any back

NJ,

You crack me up! I love the use of your word(s) copies and copy!

You are putting FUN back into the hobby; I love it.

Take care Charlie

Just trying to help out.

The likelihood of anyone trading a SL card for a common Shipke with a common back are slim to none.

[quote name="Charlie Faust III" post=1535555]NJ,

You crack me up! I love the use of your word(s) copies and copy!

You are putting FUN back into the hobby; I love it.

Take care Charlie[/QUOTE]
Thanks sir! I've been locked in the T206 room and I don't have the key, can't get out of here :)

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1535570]Just trying to help out.

The likelihood of anyone trading a SL card for a common Shipke with a common back are slim to none.[/QUOTE]
Yeah, not what I intended. Would shoot for a card+cash deal. 2nd time you've intentionally bothered my threads with advice in a not-so-positive tone. I would appreciate you just going about your way next time. 
Thanks :) 
NJ

NJ,

I'm sure Josh means no harm.

I learned from the very beginning here to not take things to personally and to treat all with respect because you just never know down the road, he may have a card that you really would like to have but past grudges stand in the way.

No problem.

Take care Charlie

Check out pre war auction on eBay and sterling auction. Both have plenty of t 206 SL players

John P

[quote name="Charlie Faust III" post=1535699]NJ,

I'm sure Josh means no harm.

I learned from the very beginning here to not take things to personally and to treat all with respect because you just never know down the road, he may have a card that you really would like to have but past grudges stand in the way.

No problem.

Take care Charlie[/QUOTE]
Ahh, you are right. Thank you for the kind words and encouragement :)

[quote name="JohnP0621" post=1535756]Check out pre war auction on eBay and sterling auction. Both have plenty of t 206 SL players

John P[/QUOTE]

I did take a look at those, some beautiful cards! I'll adjust the list as needed.
